text.text_translated: This horror film cliché was especially popular with horror films of the late 20th century. It usually begins with a group of teenagers who are enjoying themselves, yet it concludes with everyone dead apart from one girl. At the beginning, this girl is often innocent, shy, and not particularly strong. However, by the end of the film, she has become the toughest and most practical person, able to find solutions. This girl almost always wins in the end.
